docs.abstract: Marvin A Schneiderman, health statistician, dies at age 78 (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: Marvin A. Schneiderman, a specialist in health statistics and a retired associate director for science and public policy at the National Cancer Institute, died on Tuesday at his home in Bethesda, Md. He was 78. The cause was coronary artery disease, said his wife, Irene.
